Hero.title: Ricardo Augusto Kowalski
Hero.text: I’m a front-end developer fueled by coffee, good playlists, and complex challenges. I’ve been working with web development for over {years} years and, in recent years, I’ve specialized in React, Next.js and TypeScript, building scalable, high-performance applications with solid architecture and a focus on results.

buttons.github: Check out my projects and activities on GitHub
